## Host.guestunload property

Unloaded a guest and removed its [GuestServer](./uix-guest.guestserver.md) instance as well as all its [GuestUI](./uix-guest.guestui.md) instances.

**Signature:**

```typescript
guestunload: HostGuestEvent<"unload">;
```
